reviewText: Just as funny as the others in the series.

These are the funniest bloopers ever.  I cant remember a time when I laughed so hard.  The commentating is a little ridiculous and it is missing a lot of the other bloopers you can find on the internet that I cant see they have on another dvd.
You need a laugh, one that the whole family can watch. Try this DVD,

I purchased this movie while stationed in Afghanistan to boost the moral of the troops. I gathered them all together, made them some popcorn, and we watched the show. Everyone was laughing hysterically when I overheard one of the young lads shout, "This is the best movie I've seen in ten years!!!"
